english.text: Just a month was left and I was so confused and depressed that I was not sure if I would be able to complete this journey in a month. Failed due to aggregate. I was totally fed up and disappointed and I even thought of quitting my CA. I was about to skip my attempt. When the last 30 days of the exam were left, I was in a panic situation and very scared because I did not have any clear strategy to move forward. One month before exams, I was not even prepared for a single subject and I totally gave up and lost hopes that okay, this is not going to be my attempt. I used to just study for 3 hours, 2 hours, very demotivated, not really studying at all. It was the last month and I felt that nothing could be done, I just had no time left and I made a lot of mistakes. I was initially worried as to how to answer questions in a manner that ICI expects. It has been 10 years now when I have entered into CA. I cannot thank you in words. If you would not have been there, I would not have been able to pass the exam. If I had not taken this decision at that time, I would have taken one more attempt for the group fund. It built so much confidence that in just one month we can become CA and achieve good marks. The day I attended your workshop, the very next day, I studied for 14 hours. She had made us believe that even in the 30 days we can make magic. The only thing I want to say is, with Rucha ma'am, we can definitely be a CA.

segments.text: Just a month was left and I was so confused and depressed that I was not sure if I would be able to complete this journey in a month.
Failed due to aggregate. I was totally fed up and disappointed and I even thought of quitting my CA.
I was about to skip my attempt.
When the last 30 days of the exam were left, I was in a panic situation and very scared because I did not have any clear strategy to move forward.
One month before exams, I was not even prepared for a single subject and I totally gave up and lost hopes that okay, this is not going to be my attempt.
I used to just study for 3 hours, 2 hours, very demotivated, not really studying at all.
It was the last month and I felt that nothing could be done, I just had no time left and I made a lot of mistakes.
I was initially worried as to how to answer questions in a manner that ICI expects.
It has been 10 years now when I have entered into CA.
I cannot thank you in words. If you would not have been there, I would not have been able to pass the exam.
If I had not taken this decision at that time, I would have taken one more attempt for the group fund.
It built so much confidence that in just one month we can become CA and achieve good marks.
The day I attended your workshop, the very next day, I studied for 14 hours.
She had made us believe that even in the 30 days we can make magic.
The only thing I want to say is, with Rucha ma'am, we can definitely be a CA.
